channel.title: CVE Feed for Lorna Timbah (webgrrrl) -- Accessibility Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lorna Timbah (webgrrrl) -- Accessibility Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-32831|2024-08-02T02:20:35.678Z -- lorna%20timbah%20%28webgrrrl%29 -- accessibility%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Lorna Timbah (webgrrrl) Accessibility Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Accessibility Widget: from n/a through 2.2.
